source_objects.title: Database Design & Development
source_objects.description: Become a database expert with these courses ranging from basic SQL to Hadoop and Oracle mastery.

items.title: SQL Foundations

visible_instructors.title: Sagar Uppuluri
visible_instructors.name: Sagar
visible_instructors.job_title: Software Architect and a passionate trainer

items.headline: A beginners guide to SQL commands and Database Design. Learn it through quick and easy steps.
objectives_summary: Understand how to the design the database schema.
Learn SQL commands along with key insights about the logic behind the command.
Design queries, apply aggregations and combine information from multiple tables.

items.title: Master MongoDB, the NOSQL leader with Clarity and Confidence
items.headline: Learn MongoDB - Updated Every Week 100+interview Questions 100+Quizzes 60+Assignments  mongobooster  java C# nodejs php
objectives_summary: Work with MongoDB with Clarity and Confidence
Use 4 tools MongoCHEF, NOSQL Manager, RoboMongo, MongoBooster easily
Do Regex, GridFS , Replication , Sharding, Full text search

items.title: SQL Tutorial for Beginners - Learn SQL using 30 scenarios
items.headline: A comprehensive course to teach you SQL on Mac and Windows using Azure Data Studio, Microsoft SQL Server and T-SQL
objectives_summary: Learn SQL quickly using 30 real world Scenarios- SQL Tutorial for Beginners
Learn SQL using Azure Data Studio on Mac and Windows
The ultimate practical course to help you master SQL as a beginner

items.title: Getting Started with ArangoDB
items.headline: ArangoDB: One engine. One query language. Multiple models.
objectives_summary: An overview of everything ArangoDB has to offer.

items.title: Learn Basic DB2 on Mainframe for Beginners

visible_instructors.title: Sandeep Kumar
visible_instructors.name: Sandeep
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of a Training company. IT Consultant, Coach, Mentor

items.headline: Understand the DDL and DML operations on DB2.
objectives_summary: Students will be able to create tables and views. By the end of the course, students will be able to perform the basic the DDL and DML operations in DB2.

items.title: SQL Server Baby Step: Installation and Configuration
items.headline: An absolute beginner’s tutorial to quickly learn how to setup Microsoft SQL Server practice environment on your machine.
objectives_summary: At the completion of the course, you will know how to install SQL Server and create a practice environment for yourself.
Last Update Date : The course was last updated on 03 October 2017

items.title: Introduction to SQL Using TeamSQL
items.headline: Learn the basics of SQL using TeamSQL
objectives_summary: Query databases using TeamSQL
Manage their SQL tables and data

items.title: Quick introduction to influxdb

visible_instructors.title: Espen Albert
visible_instructors.name: Espen
visible_instructors.job_title: Web developer at wheel.me with a craving for learning

items.headline: Influxdb. Time to awesome = short when following examples and knowing the influxdocs
objectives_summary: Use influxdb for effectively storing and quering timeseries, e.g. storing temperatures from your IoT device
Understand the influxdb data scheme
Write basic queries

items.title: Microsoft SQL Server 2014 Database Administration

visible_instructors.title: Tarang B. Patel
visible_instructors.name: Tarang B.
visible_instructors.job_title: Web Developer and CEO at ValsadMarket

items.headline: Learn the Basics about SQL Server from Installing to Updating Data. Starting step to becoming a SQL Developer.
objectives_summary: microsoft sql server 2014 database administration skill and begaining guide
General knowledge of what a Database is.
How to install SQL Server Express 2014

items.title: Oracle SQL: An Introduction to the most popular database

visible_instructors.title: Phillip Burton
visible_instructors.name: Phillip
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor - over 350,000 students so far

items.headline: A quick tour of the six principal clauses of the SELECT statement.
objectives_summary: Either Download and Install Oracle Express Edition and Oracle SQL Developer on your computer - for free
Write your own SELECT statements.
Learn the SELECT, FROM, WHERE, GROUP BY, HAVING and ORDER BY clauses.

items.title: AWS RDS Databases - Fast Track

visible_instructors.title: Siddharth Mehta
visible_instructors.name: Siddharth
visible_instructors.job_title: Enterprise Cloud Architect, Published Author, Cloud Geek

items.headline: Fast-track training to work with relational databases on AWS Cloud using AWS Relational Database Service.
objectives_summary: Learn Amazon Relational Database Service Fundamentals and Concepts
Practice hands-on labs with open source as well as commercial databases
Learn database cost estimation techniques

items.title: SQL 101: A Beginners Guide to SQL
items.headline: A gentle introduction to the world of SQL
objectives_summary: A Basic Understanding of SQL
How to Query and Filter Data Using SQL
How to Group and Aggregate Data Using SQL

items.title: AWS Tutorials - DynamoDB and Database Migration Service
items.headline: Hands on video showcasing AWS DynamoDB and Database Migration Service
objectives_summary: Students will learn how DynamoDB and Database Migration Service Work

items.title: Develop Database Application with Minimal Coding - Kushal
items.headline: Simple Software to Design, Develop Database Application with Minimal Coding
objectives_summary: 3 sections to demonstrate Requirements,Database creation using SQLite and to develop application using Kushal.
By the end of the course you'll be able to create your own Database using SQLite and Develop Database application with very less coding.

items.title: ClickHouse crash course. Conquer big data with ease
items.headline: Learn how to use one of the most powerful open source OLAP database on the market. Put new life in your big data.
objectives_summary: ClickHouse Installation
ClickHouse Best Practices
ClickHouse Main Features

items.title: Microsoft SQL Crash Course for Absolute Beginners

visible_instructors.title: Sandeep Kumar
visible_instructors.name: Sandeep
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of a Training company. IT Consultant, Coach, Mentor

items.headline: This Crash course uses Microsoft SQL Server. The SQLs used here can also  used in Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite,etc.
objectives_summary: Start your career by learning all the basic SQL statements in Microsoft SQL Server
Queries and Files Included
Learn different ways to select Records from Tables
